title: Ariane 6 launches French spysat on second flight
summary:
An Ariane 6 launched a reconnaissance satellite for the French military March 6 on the second flight of the European rocket.
The post Ariane 6 launches French spysat on second flight appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: ULA boss says Vulcan ready for multiple launches in 2025
summary:
Bruno said ULA has six Vulcan rockets currently in production
The post ULA boss says Vulcan ready for multiple launches in 2025 appeared first on SpaceNews.

title: Ariane 6 lifts off for the second time
summary: Europe’s newest rocket, Ariane 6, took flight for the second time from Europe’s Spaceport in French Guiana at 17:24 local time on 6 March (16:24 GMT, 17:24 CET).

title: 2024 Associate Administrator Awards Honorees
summary: The ARMD 2024 Associate Administrator Awards were presented to NASA employees, contractors, and students or interns who distinguished themselves, either individually or as part of a group, through their overall approach to their work and through results they achieved during the award year. title: Questions linger about future of TraCSS
summary:
The manager of the Commerce Department’s program to develop a civil space traffic coordination system is back on the job after being swept up in layoffs.
The post Questions linger about future of TraCSS appeared first on SpaceNews.
